info.name: lowercase-text
info.description: displays text on websites in all lowercase except for text input fields. when any text is marked and copied, the originally cased text is copied.
info.additionalInfo: to also lowercase tab titles in firefox, css has to be put into the file chrome/userChrome.css in the firefox profile directory using the selector "#main-window #navigator-toolbox #TabsToolbar .tab-content".
